summary: REQ-37 and REQ-38 appear implemented by removing the specified About and Hero images. BagGallery was updated to include the new Jute and Black & White Canvas cards with the requested asset URLs, but the old towel-based card appears to remain (renamed to "Cotton Towel"), and the new static asset files themselves were not added per the diff summary. There is also an unrelated Hero typography change (inline fontSize) not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the newly uploaded images "3801.png" and "Bg-02-17.jpg" as static frontend assets under frontend/public/assets/ so they are publicly accessible at /assets/3801.png and /assets/Bg-02-17.jpg.
missing_requirements.reason: Diff summary shows no added files, and does not show the required images being added under frontend/public/assets/.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the existing "Towel bag" card from the Materials & Craftsmanship grid and replace it with a "Jute" bag card using "/assets/Bg-02-17.jpg".
missing_requirements.reason: While a new "Jute" item using "/assets/Bg-02-17.jpg" exists, the grid still includes a towel-based item ("Cotton Towel") referencing a towel bag image, suggesting the old towel card may not actually have been removed (only renamed).
evidence: frontend/src/components/BagGallery.tsx (materials includes name: 'Cotton Towel' with src '/assets/generated/material-cotton-towel-bag.dim_1200x1200.png')

hallucinated_features.description: Changed Hero heading typography by adding an inline style setting font size to 20px.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request typography changes; it only requested removing the model image box while keeping layout responsive/balanced.
